singaporeAI.title: Singapore Innovation Camp & 7-Day Academic Journey
singaporeAI.description: This is a 7-day intensive learning program that combines lectures, corporate visits, cultural workshops, and team projects to explore the unlimited potential of artificial intelligence and innovative technology in Singapore, a frontier of science and technology.

highlights.highlight1: Deep experience of the perfect integration of Singapore's traditional culture and modern innovation
highlights.highlight2: Visit renowned companies to understand Singapore's digital economy development model
highlights.highlight3: Exchange with local students to enhance cross-cultural communication skills
highlights.highlight4: Professional mentor guidance and academic certification
highlights.highlight5: Immersive language environment to rapidly improve English proficiency

admission.req4: Healthy and adaptable to group living

usArt.title: Youth Art Advanced Program
usArt.description: You Nic Co collaborates with Mass Audubon to present the Youth Art Advanced Program, perfectly combining art and nature to inspire students' creativity and imagination. Through visits to nature reserves and learning about flora and fauna, students will create art under the guidance of experienced art teachers.

highlights.highlight1: Instruction by experienced art teachers, cultivating proper painting habits in students
highlights.highlight2: Study alongside students from around the world, improving English speaking skills
highlights.highlight3: Carefully designed courses to expand students' creativity and imagination
highlights.highlight4: Visit top art schools across the US, experiencing the artistic atmosphere of prestigious institutions
highlights.highlight5: 24/7 safety protection, ensuring students' personal safety throughout the course

singaporeScience.title: 2025 Ayako Village International English Summer School
singaporeScience.description: Our international English summer school is a 14-day learning camp designed to provide comprehensive and natural immersive experiences to help students improve their English proficiency and experience Singapore culture.

academics.academic1: Comprehensive English listening, speaking, reading, and writing training
